00029 namespace glm{
00030 namespace detail
00031 {
00032         inline __m128i _mm_bit_interleave_si128(__m128i x)
00033         {
00034                 __m128i const Mask4 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x0000FFFF);
00035                 __m128i const Mask3 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x00FF00FF);
00036                 __m128i const Mask2 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x0F0F0F0F);
00037                 __m128i const Mask1 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x33333333);
00038                 __m128i const Mask0 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x55555555);
00039 
00040                 __m128i Reg1;
00041                 __m128i Reg2;
00042 
00043                 // REG1 = x;
00044                 // REG2 = y;
00045                 //Reg1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi64(x, y);
00046                 Reg1 = x;
00047 
00048                 //REG1 = ((REG1 << 16) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x0000FFFF0000FFFF);
00049                 //REG2 = ((REG2 << 16) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x0000FFFF0000FFFF);
00050                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_si128(Reg1, 2);
00051                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00052                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask4);
00053 
00054                 //REG1 = ((REG1 <<  8) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x00FF00FF00FF00FF);
00055                 //REG2 = ((REG2 <<  8) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x00FF00FF00FF00FF);
00056                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_si128(Reg1, 1);
00057                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00058                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask3);
00059 
00060                 //REG1 = ((REG1 <<  4) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F);
00061                 //REG2 = ((REG2 <<  4) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F);
00062                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_epi32(Reg1, 4);
00063                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00064                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask2);
00065 
00066                 //REG1 = ((REG1 <<  2) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x3333333333333333);
00067                 //REG2 = ((REG2 <<  2) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x3333333333333333);
00068                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_epi32(Reg1, 2);
00069                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00070                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask1);
00071 
00072                 //REG1 = ((REG1 <<  1) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x5555555555555555);
00073                 //REG2 = ((REG2 <<  1) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x5555555555555555);
00074                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_epi32(Reg1, 1);
00075                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00076                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask0);
00077 
00078                 //return REG1 | (REG2 << 1);
00079                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_epi32(Reg1, 1);
00080                 Reg2 = _mm_srli_si128(Reg2, 8);
00081                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg1, Reg2);
00082         
00083                 return Reg1;
00084         }
00085 
00086         inline __m128i _mm_bit_interleave_si128(__m128i x, __m128i y)
00087         {
00088                 __m128i const Mask4 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x0000FFFF);
00089                 __m128i const Mask3 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x00FF00FF);
00090                 __m128i const Mask2 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x0F0F0F0F);
00091                 __m128i const Mask1 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x33333333);
00092                 __m128i const Mask0 = _mm_set1_epi32(0x55555555);
00093 
00094                 __m128i Reg1;
00095                 __m128i Reg2;
00096 
00097                 // REG1 = x;
00098                 // REG2 = y;
00099                 Reg1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi64(x, y);
00100 
00101                 //REG1 = ((REG1 << 16) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x0000FFFF0000FFFF);
00102                 //REG2 = ((REG2 << 16) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x0000FFFF0000FFFF);
00103                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_si128(Reg1, 2);
00104                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00105                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask4);
00106 
00107                 //REG1 = ((REG1 <<  8) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x00FF00FF00FF00FF);
00108                 //REG2 = ((REG2 <<  8) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x00FF00FF00FF00FF);
00109                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_si128(Reg1, 1);
00110                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00111                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask3);
00112 
00113                 //REG1 = ((REG1 <<  4) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F);
00114                 //REG2 = ((REG2 <<  4) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F);
00115                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_epi32(Reg1, 4);
00116                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00117                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask2);
00118 
00119                 //REG1 = ((REG1 <<  2) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x3333333333333333);
00120                 //REG2 = ((REG2 <<  2) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x3333333333333333);
00121                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_epi32(Reg1, 2);
00122                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00123                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask1);
00124 
00125                 //REG1 = ((REG1 <<  1) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x5555555555555555);
00126                 //REG2 = ((REG2 <<  1) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x5555555555555555);
00127                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_epi32(Reg1, 1);
00128                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg2, Reg1);
00129                 Reg1 = _mm_and_si128(Reg1, Mask0);
00130 
00131                 //return REG1 | (REG2 << 1);
00132                 Reg2 = _mm_slli_epi32(Reg1, 1);
00133                 Reg2 = _mm_srli_si128(Reg2, 8);
00134                 Reg1 = _mm_or_si128(Reg1, Reg2);
00135         
00136                 return Reg1;
00137         }
00138 }//namespace detail
00139 }//namespace glms
